name: Battery hunt
description:
Made by :  Dafrasa from the DafrasaStudio team

Discord Profile: Dafrasa#6663

---------------------------------------------

DESCRIPTION

Battery Hunt is a game made for the enter-name-studio game jam. The game about a robot that is in a game but the game is broken. 

---------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

walk=    a/d     or      ←/→

climb up/down ladder=    w/s     or      ↑/↓

jump=     spacebar
